greenlute.name: Danny's Green Lute
greenlute.desc: The first lute Danny bought for himself, made from groed wood, it sounds passable at best.

fireiron.name: Fire Aligned Metals
fireiron.desc: Easily sharpended and purified to a high degree.

wateriron.name: Water Aligned Metals
wateriron.desc: Strong, but flexes back after being bent, rather than deforming.

redclove.name: Redclove
redclove.desc: A natrually fire aligned herb, it is notable for it's spicy flavor.

groed.name: Groed Wood
groed.desc: A green colored, low quality wood that is abundant due to how quickly the trees grow.
